table_description: Tracks revenue forecasts and recognized revenue across different time periods for projects and quotes.

table_columns.name: forecasted_revenue
table_columns.description: The projected or estimated revenue amount for the period. important column for query

table_columns.name: id
table_columns.description: Unique identifier for the revenue forecast period record.

table_columns.name: period
table_columns.description: The time period (e.g., month, quarter, year) for which the revenue is forecasted or recognized.

table_columns.name: project_id
table_columns.description: Reference to the project associated with this revenue forecast.

table_columns.name: quote_id
table_columns.description: Reference to the quote associated with this revenue forecast.

table_columns.name: recognized_revenue
table_columns.description: The actual revenue that has been recognized or realized for the period.

table_columns.name: _weld_synced
table_columns.description: DONT USE THIS COLUMN FOR ANYTHING. IN QUERY
